info.name: Not Safe For Humanity 2
info.description: My second generic deck, also made with the Ars Against Humanity G+ group. I like to believe it is better constructed and more focused than NSFH1, thanks to over a year of experience and research into deck making.

calls.text: Nothing is worse than having to clean up after _.
During the 2013 shutdown the US government had to stop all funding for _.
In high school I was voted "Most Likely To End Up _."
Thanks to budget cuts, NASA has been reduced to strapping a rocket to _.
_ is a luxury we can no longer afford.
We are gathered here today to witness the union of _ and _.
The most powerful force in Washington DC is the _ Lobby.
How do I kill time at work?
Since drugs and terror are dealt with, America has declared The War On _.
In case of emergency break glass and begin _.
Remember: Take only _ and leave only _.
My grandmother taught me 101 uses for _.
Thank you for calling Technical Support. What is the answer to your Secret Security Question?
The Westboro Baptist Church has announced it will now protest against _.
This program is dedicated in loving memory of _.
Psst, buddy, can I interest you in _?
_ is the only reason I get up in the morning.
Diarrhea is like _ raging inside you.
There's no problem that can't be solved with liberal application of _.

responses.text: pretending your penis is a lightsaber
Glenn Beck's skin sloughing off in meaty clumps upon direct contact with sunlight
writing, directing, and starring in snuff porn
Glenn Beck's internal organs liquefying and exiting through his sphincter
a cat stoned off its furry ass
cunnilingus performed by a giant spider
god turning his back on the world
an unmarked white van full of puppies and candy
the crushing weight of our monotonous daily lives
a tired and emotional mother of three
that empty moment when your heart stops
both eyes popping out on springs
the 26 feet of intestines inside us all
a drunken shopping mall Santa and his two ex-con elves
a screwdriver straight to the kidneys
rolling in flour to find the wet spot
